mapper.select: select huc.COMMON_USER_NO, huc.USER_NAME, huc.GENDER_CD, count(hr.RESERV_NO) reservCount, LEFT(DATE_FORMAT(huc.LOGIN_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S%f'), 16) loginDt from HC_USER_COMMON huc join HC_CUSTOMER_MAP hcm on huc.COMMON_USER_NO = hcm.COMMON_USER_NO join HC_USER hu on hcm.USER_NO = hu.USER_NO left join HC_CHECKUP_ROSTER hcr on hu.USER_NO = hcr.USER_NO and hcr.CHECKUP_ROSTER_ST not in ('80', '90') left join HC_RESERV hr on hcr.CHECKUP_ROSTER_NO = hr.CHECKUP_ROSTER_NO and hr.RESERV_ST not in ('80', '90') where huc.COMMON_USER_NO = #{commonUserNo} and hu.USER_ST not in ('90')
